rows.label: bf04220100_0010
rows.name:
Long time ago, Grampypon Senzo and
Dadapon Tatezo were working on her.

rows.label: bf04220100_0020
rows.name:
Grampypon and Dadapon and Tora
all wanted to become Driver.

rows.label: bf04220100_0030
rows.name: However... Not single one of us have potential...

rows.label: bf04220100_0040
rows.name:
So we decide to work together
and make artificial Blade.

rows.label: bf04220100_0060
rows.name:
You must run, Tora! Take this and go!
Someday, you finish what we started!
